class.name: MediaPipeImage
class.brief_description: A image class that wraps CPU and GPU data in MediaPipe.
class.description: [MediaPipeImage] wraps CPU ([code]mediapipe::ImageFrame[/code]) and GPU ([code]mediapipe::GpuBuffer[/code]) image data.

method.name: convert_to_cpu
method.description: Converts the GPU image to CPU.

method.name: get_image_frame_packet
method.description: Gets a [MediaPipePacket] which contain the image as [code]mediapipe::ImageFrame[/code].

method.name: get_packet
method.description: Gets a [MediaPipePacket] which contain the image as [code]mediapipe::Image[/code].

method.name: is_gpu_image
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the image data is on GPU.

members.member: The image data accessible on Godot. Accessing this property will convert the image to CPU.
